      • transform

        public abstract T[] transform(java.lang.String[] values,
                              boolean isArray,
                              java.lang.String arg)
        Transforms the given Trading Networks extracted document attribute values.
        Parameters:
        values - The extracted document attribute values to transform.
        isArray - Whether there are multiple values to be transformed.
        arg - The modifying argument for the transformation, if applicable.
        Returns:
        The transformed document attribute values.

      • transform

        public com.wm.data.IData transform(com.wm.data.IData pipeline)
        Transforms the given Trading Networks document attribute transformation pipeline.
        Parameters:
        pipeline - The pipeline to apply the transformation to.
        Returns:
        The transformed pipeline.

      • transform

        public static <T> com.wm.data.IData transform(com.wm.data.IData pipeline,
                                              Transformer<T> transformer)
        Apply the given transformer to the given Trading Networks document attribute transformation pipeline.
        Type Parameters:
        T - The class of the transformed values.
        Parameters:
        pipeline - The pipeline to apply the transformation to.
        transformer - The transformer to use.
        Returns:
        The transformed pipeline.
